ca.ualberta.cs.linkai.beep

Class RequestNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.linkai.beep.RequestNotification

  • public class RequestNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for showing and canceling request notifications.

    This class makes heavy use of the NotificationCompat.Builder helper class to create notifications in a backward-compatible way.
